summary: This is an email chain from December 15, 2020, summarizing a call with an individual (likely a victim or witness) regarding their knowledge of Ghislaine Maxwell's (GM) activities and associates. The email lists individuals the source believes were aware of the source's interactions with Maxwell and reiterates the source's strong stance against Maxwell's bail.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to as 'GM' throughout the document; the subject of the bail discussion and the person who allegedly facilitated interactions between the source and other individuals.

persons.name: Donald Trump
persons.context: Listed as an individual who knew about the source's interactions with Ghislaine Maxwell; specifically noted that 'GM set up on a date with him'.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Listed as an individual who knew about the source's interactions with Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell allegedly set the source up on a date with Donald Trump, indicating a social connection.
The source believes Alan Dershowitz knew about the source's interactions with Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Call Regarding Maxwell's Associates
events.description: A call was held to discuss individuals who were allegedly aware of the source's interactions with Ghislaine Maxwell and to reiterate the source's opposition to Maxwell's bail.

events.title: Previous Statement on Bail
events.description: The source provided a statement in July 2020 opposing Ghislaine Maxwell's bail and reaffirms that stance in this December 2020 communication.

keyFacts: The source believes multiple individuals, including Donald Trump and Alan Dershowitz, knew about the source's interactions with Ghislaine Maxwell.
Ghislaine Maxwell allegedly set the source up on a date with Donald Trump.
The source strongly opposes Ghislaine Maxwell's release on bail, reaffirming a position stated in July 2020.
The document references other individuals whose names are redacted, including a 'best friend' of the source and another victim.
The email is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs.
